r.s: APM and distributed tracing for PHP
r.d: The Datadog PHP Tracer brings APM and distributed tracing to PHP.
r.n:
### Added - Symfony 2.3 web tests for resource name #349 - Update images and enable leak detection, split tests in CI to Unit, Integration and Web #299
### Fixed - Resource name on Symfony 2.x requests served through controllers #341 - Sanitize url in web spans #344 - Laravel 5.8 compatibility #351
